meta.note: Fibonacci levels baseret på swing high/low identification

0.236.best_use: Shallow pullback i stærk trend, ofte ignoreret

fib_plus_round_number.description: Fib level aligns med $10 eller $50 round number

fib_plus_ema.description: Fib level aligns med EMA20 eller EMA50

fib_plus_previous_sr.description: Fib level aligns med previous support/resistance

fib_bounce.description: Enter at fib level expecting bounce
fib_bounce.entry: Limit order at fib level or candle close confirmation
fib_bounce.stop: Below next fib level or 1 ATR
fib_bounce.target: Previous swing high/low or next fib extension

fib_break.description: Enter on break of key fib level
fib_break.entry: Break and close beyond 0.618 signals trend change
fib_break.note: Break of 0.618 often means full retrace to 1.0

fib_cluster.description: Wait for multiple fib levels + other factors
fib_cluster.entry: Only trade when 2+ confluence factors align
fib_cluster.note: Lower frequency but higher quality setups

identification_rules.swing_high_low: Use significant pivots, not minor wiggles
identification_rules.timeframe: Higher timeframe more reliable (4H, Daily vs 5min)
identification_rules.trend_context: Fibs work best WITH trend, not against

common_mistakes.trading_against_trend: Fading strong trends at shallow fibs
common_mistakes.no_confirmation: Entering at level without price action
common_mistakes.ignoring_context: Trading fibs in range-bound choppy markets
common_mistakes.over_optimization: Drawing too many fib levels clutters chart
